definition: to show deference or praise publicly
to supply/to provide
to/for/for the benefit of/to give/to allow/to do sth (for sb)/(grammatical equivalent of 被)/(grammatical equivalent of 把)/(sentence intensifier)
flour/noodles/(of food) soft (not crunchy)/(slang) (of a person) ineffectual/spineless
variant of 麵|面[mian4]
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc
(noun suffix)

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: What Chinese cannot bear most is to be refused or to lose face.
sentences.chinese: 中国人认为最不能容忍的事情是受到拒绝和不给面子。

sentences.english: Hey, you elephants, none of you cares about my feelings.
sentences.chinese: 哎，我说你们这群大象还真不给面子。

sentences.english: Tuotuo has given the face to chewing slowly; chewing was pulpy but hard to swallow.
sentences.chinese: 脱脱很给面子地慢慢嚼着，嚼得稀烂却难以下咽。

sentences.english: The fans are great wherever we play but here it was very special.
sentences.chinese: 我们踢球的时候球迷们都很给面子，但这里很特别。

definition: wonderful/great/delightful/very kind/generous
tactful/discreet
polite/courteous/formal/modest
to act tactfully/tactful/discreet
sensitive/tactful
to feel grateful to sb/to appreciate the kindness
to show respect for/to think highly of
to have a clear view of things/to adapt to circumstances
to show deference to sb by obliging them (or by obliging sb associated with them)
(polite) do me the honor
to throw one's weight around/to put on airs
to tackle a difficult job (idiom)/to do sth reluctantly
to acknowledge sb as senior or superior (often in negative)/to accept (a version of events)/to buy it
you're welcome/don't mention it/impolite/rude/blunt
to put on airs/to be ostentatious
to have the nerve/what a cheek!/to feel no shame/to overcome the shame/(is it) proper? (rhetorical question)
